Parsing [sent. 239 len. 11]: CHAPTER V. And why should Annie think of the future ?

Parsing [sent. 265 len. 3]: CHAPTER VI .

Parsing [sent. 348 len. 3]: CHAPTER VII .
Parsing [sent. 349 len. 36]: A day that is fifty years off comes as certainly as if it had been in the next week ; and Annie 's feeling of infinite duration did not stop the sand-glass of Old Time .
